We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private TripleExponentialMovingAverage _tema;
// In Initialize()
_tema = TEMA(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_tema.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "TEMA Is Ready", _tema.IsReady);
    Plot("My Indicators", "TEMA Warm Up Period", _tema.WarmUpPeriod);
    Plot("My Indicators", "TEMA Current", _tema.Current);
    Plot("My Indicators", "TEMA Name", _tema.Name);
    Plot("My Indicators", "TEMA Samples", _tema.Samples);
}
# In Initialize()
self.tema = self.TEMA(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.tema.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "TEMA Is Ready", self.tema.IsReady);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "TEMA Warm Up Period", self.tema.WarmUpPeriod);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "TEMA Current", self.tema.Current);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "TEMA Name", self.tema.Name);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "TEMA Samples", self.tema.Samples);
